plot: Mistaken for a famous dancer, an alien travels to earth looking for an elixir with magical properties in order to compete in a futuristic dance competition.
title: Elixir
plot_es: Mistaken for a famous dancer, an alien travels to earth looking for an elixir with magical properties in order to compete in a futuristic dance competition.
plot_en: Mistaken for a famous dancer, an alien travels to earth looking for an elixir with magical properties in order to compete in a futuristic dance competition.
